trigger.title: Trigger: Thrown Item Picked Up by Player
trigger.description: Triggers when a player picks up an item thrown by another entity.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

item.title: Item
item.description: The thrown item which was picked up.

anyOf.description: Specifies a list of predicates that must pass in order for the criterion to be granted. The checks are applied to the entity, with the origin being the position of the player that would get the advancement.
The entity that threw the item.
